actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment for screening mammography in the same amounts as is provided for similar mammography.
short_title: Older Women's Cancer Prevention Act of 1988

summary.text: Older Women's Cancer Prevention Act of 1988 - Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the cap on coverage of screening mammography.

titles.title: Older Women's Cancer Prevention Act of 1988
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment for screening mammography in the same amounts as is provided for similar mammography.
